video_prompt: Anime character's light blue hair sways as she smiles, eyes widening playfully. Blush deepens. Buildings shift and blur, signs flicker with illumination. Traffic light changes. Distant figures move, their forms indistinct. Urban environment bustles with subtle, dynamic shifts.
image_prompt: Vibrant anime street scene, medium shot of charming character with gentle smile, direct gaze. Long, flowing light blue hair with white highlights, bright blue eyes, subtle blush. Dark purple fitted jacket with gold buttons over cream/white dress. Double strand choker with small gold pendant, gold necklace with intricate gold/blue pendant. Black fox mask with gold designs and glowing blue eyes on right side of head, gold head band. Gold armlet with black accents on right arm. Bustling cityscape background: clear blue sky, multi-story buildings with Japanese signs (some glowing), utility poles/wires, green traffic light. Blurred figures in distance, modern urban environment.
refined_video_prompt: Hair sways. Her smile widens, eyes playfully widening as blush deepens. Buildings shift and blur; signs flicker with illumination. A traffic light changes. Distant, indistinct figures move, while the urban environment subtly bustles with dynamic shifts.
